lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace forward Loic Remy has suffered a new injury and will be out for up to three more weeks before making his debut, manager Alan Pardew said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Palace Striker Remy Suffers New Injury Setback
headline.main: Palace Striker Remy Suffers New Injury Setback

snippet: Crystal Palace forward Loic Remy has suffered a new injury and will be out for up to three more weeks before making his debut, manager Alan Pardew said on Friday....
